Articles.Content:
Whenever I decided to edit any parts of the wiki and submit my edit, this happens:

Spoiler

Error 1015

You are being rate limited

What happened?

The owner of this website (wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com) has banned you temporarily from accessing this website.

Now I can't even access this forum! I used a VPN just to post this thread here....

What happened? Why?

14 hours ago, Turf said:

What happened? Why?

Hmm, that's odd.  Sounds like some sort of IT issue, we'll bring it up with the relevant folks to have a look.
Hey Turf thanks for reporting it, could you provide the Ray ID located at the bottom of the error page? also What web browser are you using and plugins/extensions installed on it?
Pinging @Turf just to make sure you see ManeTI's questions.

I... forgot the Ray ID, but it sure happened several minutes before this thread was posted.
Also, I tried to edit wiki again, in the hopes of trying to replicate it again, but now it worked again for me. The site simply asked me to do a captcha thing again.
I guess it was probably my browser turning off JavaScript by default on the captcha thing that triggers the ban.
